content:
ONC has released the US Core Data for Interoperability Version 2 (USCDI V2 ). https://www.healthit.gov/isa/united-states-core-data-interoperability-uscdi#uscdi-v2

Got questions? Don't miss your chance to ask them during the "Ask the ONC" topic at the upcoming C-CDA Implementation-A-Thon.

Register today for the July 28, 2021 IAT!
http://www.hl7.org/events/c-cda/implementation/2021/07/
